text: "Pride (In The Name of Love)" is a 1984 song by Irish rock band U2 and is the leading single from their fourth studio album The Unforgettable Fire. It went to number 1 in New Zealand, number 2 in Ireland, number 3 in the United Kingdom, number 4 in Australia, number 5 in the Netherlands, number 6 in Belgium, number 7 in Norway, number 9 in Poland, number 12 in Sweden, number 20 in Italy, number 26 in Canada, number 27 in Germany and number 33 in the United States. ==Formats and track listings== == References == Category:1984 songs Category:U2 songs Category:Martin Luther King Jr.
title: Pride (In The Name Of Love)
